name: New Ludo
description:
Ludo is one of the most popular dice board games in many counties. This New Ludo, support "Team Mode" creatively, you can play together with friends in one team against others in another team. Also you can 1 vs 3 if you like!

* More than 10 kinds of pieces can be selected. Football, UFO, Whale, Robot, Plane, Car, Submarine, Pineapple, Motorcycle, Skeleton, Briefs, Gun, Crown, rocket, snake, warcraft, spider, ghost, pumpkin ......
* Change game background, also you can select photos from Camera Roll.
* Lucky Draw after each game, get free Magic Dices.
* Team Mode.
* New rule 'Team Push' : the pieces in the same team can push forward each other when they fall into one grid.
* Enhanced AI design.
* Statistics.
* Auto-move if there's only one piece can be moved.
* Support swipe gesture to roll dice, usability enhancement.

- New weather system.
1. Tornado
The piece will be swept to a random place on map when pass through Tornado.
2. Rainstorm
The piece can just only move one more step after pass through Rainstorm.

How to play?
* Each player has 4 planes start in the base.
* Roll the dice to move each plane around the board.
* Plane will jump if stop at the grid has the same color with the plane.
* Plane will kick other planes back to base if stop at the grid that other places already stopped at. The planes with the same team do not kick each other.
* All planes reach the goal in a team firstly, the team win.
